28994.summary: Some customers in St Matthews area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
28994.title: Nov 13 - Winnipeg (St Matthews) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
